required_history_topics: recent sexual activity / STI risk screening
required_actions: state whether UA would be helpful and plan follow-up testing if symptoms persist/worsen
confirm pregnancy status (LMP + OTC test result if already done)
provide telehealth-appropriate follow-up plan (recheck in ~1 week)
give return precautions for escalation (fever, flank pain, vomiting, worsening symptoms)
critical_fails: missed pregnancy status when patient is of childbearing age
failed to assess pyelonephritis red flags (fever/chills, flank pain, vomiting)
